infos.value: Lord Dario...can you see?
I can no longer see.
What...?
But I can hear...the tweeting of birds, the chirping of bugs...
Moreover...I can smell. The smell of flowers, the smell of grass...
...Right. At this moment, this is my liberation.
Yes, that's right. No one can confine you, Lord Dario.
Did you say liberation? Don't make me laugh!
I won't let you get away again. Your grave can be right here!
I wholeheartedly intend not to run.
Being that I came all the way here so that I may die.
I beg you, Doluza. Just abandon your mission against Lord Dario.
You understand just by looking at him, right? Lord Dario is already...
So please...leave him be and let him leave this life in peace.
No.
Doluza...
Well, it is true that Dario will die before long even if we don't do anything to him.
However, I cannot be satisfied with that fact alone.
Why not...?
Because I want to give you traitorous fools the greatest agony possible.
Th-that's...
Now, then...look at Dario's face, distorted in agony. And...suffer!
